_aChangeLog.text: [1] Soldire grenades only dmg zombies.
[1] Fixed final zombie dumbster zombie trap.
[1N] Added additional cover in tunnel.
[1E] Removed bridge_pipe from extreme mode.
[1E] Added extra hold time in tank base.
[2] Added zombie helper to minification game.
[2] Added human items to minification route.
[2E] Added extra doors to weapons_room.
[2E] Added randome route.
[3N] Changed speed from top elevator to 150 (prev 100).
[3N] Closed off unused button area.
[3E] Added extra hold time at the begining.
zombie_predator removed suicide attack.
zombie_jumper push force changed to 400 (prev 600).
zombie_jumper health changed to 1800 (prev 2300).
zombie_alma health changed to 2500 (prev 3300).
zombie_vortigaunt pull force changed to 1000 (prev 1500).
zombie_shockwave fixed zombie only push.
S1 Added player counter for dynamic difficulty ending.
S1 Added more hidden items.
S2 Added dmg filter for push pillar.
S2 Added inv-wall to prevent zombies from jumping to the side of the second toggleable bridge.
S3 Reduced holding time in long corridor.
S3 Added helper text for triggered consoles in long corridor.
S3 Added small zombie push in ice testing chamber.
S3 Fixed zombie_boss freeze at defeat.
S4 Added Playercounter for dynamic difficulty ending.
S5 Reduced holding time at first long hold.
S5 Fixed song length of first song.
ALL Increased cooldown for thunder gun to 2 seconds.
ALL Added helper signs.
ALL Added Fallback fade.

_sText:
Download now and get the Special Edition!

  1. Access to the .vmf file to check and look at the map in the editor.
  2. Full Changelog, Credits, Music and Legacy Information. 
  3. gkuo88 old LMS guides
  4. Promotional Material

v6 Is now available

It is finaly here!
Bigger and better than ever before.

After many months of work and after understaning how hannibal made this huge map i can present to you a hopefully working version of his
greatest, largest and last map.

Based on a post-apocalyptic future where the last remains of the 
humanity will activate the final device for killing all zombies around the globe.
Four stages, four generators. The humans objective: activate all the generators and
defend the main core in the fifth stage.
The map tries to keep the shape and gameplay of the classic maps:

  • No mass teleports to force players to move ahead.
  • No invisible walls.
  • All ways are connected with no teleports.
  • Wide paths
  • Intense action due the lack of helps to the human team The map, although, includes modern maps features.
  • Human items (stages 2,4,5)
  • Zombie items (stage 3,5)
  • Stages system
  • Extreme mode
  • Player controlled boss
  • Event system

Event system: 
Hidden and visible events may be triggered by players
during the stages 1,2,3 and 4. These will alter the gameplay in the stage 5 and will determine how easy or difficult will be to defend the core and save the humanity.

Extreme:
Extreme difficult will be enabled after stage 5 is completed.
Completing extreme difficulty will be considered completing the map at 100%
